body.p: I enclose to you 2 petitions one for Doct I. T. Ladd, and the other for Wesly Burnett.
I wish you to hand them to the Governor & tell him they are very clever nice men and not Gamblers, and the facts set forth in them are nothing but facts.
When you receive action upon them please let him hand it to you and you send it to me or bring it with you at October Court.
Do this for me and my friend & I will reciprocate

Trimble Cir Ct
vs
W Burnett & Isham T. Ladd
Remit
$25. each
Gaming
8th Oct/64
